mapper.select: select pt.* from room_info ri left join room_payment_type rpt on ri.id=rpt.room_id and rpt.is_deleted=0 left join payment_type pt on rpt.payment_type_id=pt.id and ri.is_deleted=0 where ri.id=#{id};

select pt.id,pt.name,pt.pay_month_count,pt.additional_info from room_payment_type rpt left join payment_type pt on rpt.payment_type_id=pt.id and pt.is_deleted=0 where rpt.is_deleted=0 and rpt.room_id=#{id};
